org.kaaproject.kaa.client.channel

Interface BootstrapTransport

  • All Superinterfaces:
    KaaTransport
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultBootstrapTransport

    public interface BootstrapTransport
extends KaaTransport
    KaaTransport for the Bootstrap service. Updates the Bootstrap manager state.
    Author:
    Yaroslav Zeygerman
